channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description: yeh, uhm. ive checked and rechecked the IP i'm using and it just isnt working. i dunno if ive missed something or maybe its just server-sided, but i'mat a loss for what to do.

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

infallibl3:

theres no CMD errors, it just doesnt connect to the source.

Are you sure, you have the right client?
Try to connect to, ‘127.0.0.1’ || ‘localhost’

Jc22493:

You don’t set up a server to play by yourself, right?

I laughed my ass off.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @tranomo tranomo
item.description:
@tranomo wrote:

check the firewall on the host, and then the whitelist/blacklist of ip addresses, if that’s not the issue re-check your port forwarding. What operating system are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

its a PI. It does compile correctly. i thought i set up portforwarding and no-ip, but even still, i SHOULD be connecting to a localhost, should i not?

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“matiasmunk, post:7, topic:444686”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=547372.msg4013384#msg4013384 date=1339427000]

in the client.java in the client I’ve changed server = ""; and public static String server = ""; to 127.0.0.1, to 0.0.0.0, and to my no-ip, compiling and testing after each. those are all the steps ive taken, so i assume its a server-sided problem, which ive never encountered before.

Have you set up your No-IP, port-forwarded, etc?
[/quote]

No need to setup No-IP or portforward if connecting to localhost ;)[/quote]

You don’t set up a server to play by yourself, right?

Read full topic

item.description:
@soapface wrote:

Is it even compiling correctly?
Because you should be able to connect to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
Also, what source are you using?

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:2, topic:444686”]I’m going to move this to Server Help.

As for your problem, can you list what steps you’ve taken and we’ll continue from there?[/quote]
I think it qualifies as a client problem. The server doesn’t ‘connect’ to anything, just receive connections.

It’s likely something to do with portforwarding/firewall

Read full topic
